title.text: HORN EXTENDED FEATURE STRUCTURES: FAST UNIFICATION WITH NEGATION AND LIMITED DISJUNCTION t

abstractContent.text: The notion of a Horn extended feature structure (HoXF) is introduced, which is a feature structure constrained so that its only allowable extensions are those satisfying some set of llorn clauses in feature-term logic, lloXF's greatly generalize ordinary feature structures in admitting explicit representation of negative and implicational constraints.

In contradis-tinction to the general casein which arbitrary logical constraints are allowed (for which the best known algorithms are exponential), there is a highly tractable algorithm for the unification of HoXF's.
